name: theme-pink-candy
description: A vivid colour scheme with a pink accent, in both light and dark variants.

theme-pink-candy.mutedMarkdownPlaintext.description: Controls whether markdown plaintext has a muted appearance.

theme-pink-candy.alternateCurrentLineSty.description: Controls whether the current-line uses an alternate appearance (outlined instead of filled in).

theme-pink-candy.monochromeBracketPairGu.description: Controls whether bracket pair guides are monochrome.

theme-pink-candy.inlayHintStyle.description: Controls the appearance of inlay hints.
enumDescriptions: No background behind the inlay hint; this is the 'default' option.
A lightly shaded background behind the inlay hint for better contrast.
An accent colour for the inlay hint text.
An accent colour for the inlay hint text and shaded background.

theme-pink-candy.globalAccent.description: Controls where the accent colours are used.
markdownEnumDescriptions: The accent colours are used everywhere; this is the 'default' option.
The accent colours are used everywhere *but* on the status bar.
The accent colours are used only in a select few cases, such as buttons, links, important text, small decorations, etc.
